Package com.badlogic.gdx.math

Class Summary
BoundingBox Encapsulates an axis aligned bounding box represented by a minimum and a maximum Vector.
CatmullRomSpline Encapsulates a catmull rom spline with n control points, n >= 4.
EarCutTriangulator A simple implementation of the ear cutting algorithm to triangulate simple polygons without holes.
Frustum Encapsulates a view frustum based on clipping planes.
Intersector Class offering various static methods for intersection testing between different geometric objects.
Matrix Encapsulates a column major 4 by 4 matrix.
Plane A plane defined via a unit length normal and the distance from the origin, as you learned in your math class.
Quaternion A simple quaternion class.
Ray Encapsulates a ray having a starting position and a unit length direction.
Rectangle Encapsulates a 2D rectangle defined by it's bottom corner point and its extends in x (width) and y (height).
Sphere Encapsulates a 3D sphere with a center and a radius
Vector Encapsulates a 3D vector.
Vector2D Encapsulates a 2D vector.
WindowedMean A simple class keeping track of the mean of a stream of values within a certain window. the WindowedMean will only return a value in case enough data has been sampled.
